name: @react-native-community/slider
author: react-native-community
description: React Native component used to select a single value from a range of values.

scripts.test: yarn validate:eslint && yarn validate:flow && yarn test:jest
scripts.test:detox:ios:bundle:release: mkdir -p .tmp && react-native bundle --max-workers 4 --platform ios --dev false --entry-file example/index.js --bundle-output .tmp/ios-bundle.js

ios.sim.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project example/ios/example.xcodeproj -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone X' -scheme example -parallelizeTargets -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath example/ios/build  -UseModernBuildSystem=YES
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone X

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project example/ios/example.xcodeproj -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone X' -scheme example -parallelizeTargets -configuration Release -derivedDataPath example/ios/build  -UseModernBuildSystem=YES
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone X

android.emu.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && pushd example/android && ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && popd
android.emu.debug.name: TestingAVD

android.emu.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && pushd example/android && ./gradlew assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && popd
android.emu.release.name: TestingAVD
